resources.string:
\ Thank you for donating!

\ KeepScore Donate is just an add-on to KeepScore, \ so you must install the original app as well.

\ Thanks again! ☺

\ Thank you for donating!

\ While installed, KeepScore Donate adds a special message to the "About" section of KeepScore.

\ This app icon will remove itself the next time you reboot.

\ Thanks again! ☺
